title: Chapter 4347 - Chapter 4347: With 4346 Pairs Of Breakthroughs
body:
Chapter 4347 - Chapter 4347: With 4346 Pairs Of Breakthroughs

Chapter 4347: With 4346 pairs of breakthroughs

Translator: 549690339

“Boom! Boom!”

“Boom! Boom!”

The King of darkness and the leader of the water god Dragon started to break through.

A violent aura spread out in the surroundings.

The entire starry sky gathered energy.

Wang Xian and the demonic fiend watched quietly.

To prevent any accidents from happening.

“HMM?”

At the same time, at the center of the Wizard Spirit Universe.

At the three wizard Spirit Halls.

At the center of one of the sorcerer spirit halls, there was one with three heads. Each head was bald, and there were dense patterns and words on them.

The three-headed old man sat cross-legged inside and suddenly opened his eyes. His deep gaze was looking in a direction.

“Breakthrough? You’re courting death. There are actually people who dare to make a breakthrough in my sorcerer Spirit Universe, and there are two of them!”

The three-headed old man stood up, his three faces filled with ice-cold expressions.

With a wave of his arm, a map image appeared in front of him.

On the map, there were two dots of light.

The three-headed old man’s expression was dark and cold, and a surge of energy was injected into the map.

Following that, the patterns on his legs spread to his surroundings, as if forming a special altar.

Buzz

This was not an altar, but a teleportation formation.

The teleportation formation slowly emitted a glow, and the figure of the three-headed old man quickly disappeared.

In an instant, his figure appeared in an area not far away from Wang Xian and the rest.

The three-headed old man raised his head and looked at the two places where he had made his breakthrough. A murderous intent appeared in his eyes!

Boom

His body moved and he flew straight over!

“Huh?”

At this moment, Wang Xian was quietly watching the breakthrough of the Dark Night King and the leader of the Water God Dragon.

At this moment, he raised his eyebrows. His face was filled with astonishment.

“He came here so quickly? There isn’t any teleportation formation in the surroundings, yet he managed to come here so quickly. Is this a special teleportation?”

Wang Xian looked in a direction with a puzzled expression.

Soon, a figure with three heads appeared in his line of sight!

The figure with three heads didn’t hesitate at all when he arrived.

He waved his arm and a surge of energy attacked the King of darkness and the leader of the Water God Dragon.

This surge of energy was formed by countless runes. It looked like a long snake and was extremely terrifying!

Mo Sha saw his attack and a cold look appeared in his eyes.

He waved his arm that was eager to give it a try. A huge phantom of a devil head headed towards the attack of the three-headed old man.

“Roar Roar!”

The Phantom of the Devil Head let out a low roar and easily swallowed the attack of the three-headed old man.

“Who are you people? You actually dared to make a breakthrough in our voodoo universe and want to occupy the spot of the Heaven origin creation in our universe. Are you trying to start a war with our voodoo universe?”

The three-headed old man saw that his attack was easily blocked. He focused his gaze and looked at Mo Sha and Wang Xian!

“We want the spot of darkness and water element in your voodoo universe!”

Mo Sha stared at him and said with a cold face!

“Are you looking for death? With just you guys? Wishful Thinking!”

The eyes of the three-headed old man were filled with fury. The runes above his head began to rotate.

Around him, one after another, the runes started to cover Wang Xian and the rest.

A large-scale attack formation was quickly formed!

“Kill them directly!”

Wang Xian saw this scene and started to move.

Wang Xian did not have a good impression of the universe of the evil sequence faction and these powerhouses.

He started to move and decided to kill the three-headed old man directly!

Buzz

Wang Xian’s figure flashed and teleported to the side of the three old men!

With a wave of his arm, the Phantom of a divine dragon surrounded the three old men!

The threat of death instantly enveloped him.

“Oh no!”

“Oh no, who are you people? Which Universe are you from? We are the universe of the evil sequence faction. If you kill me, I will ask the experts in the faction to make you pay the price!”

The moment Wang Xian made his move.

The expression of the three-headed old man instantly turned horrified as he roared loudly.

Boom

Wang Xian didn’t say anything to him. The terrifying divine dragon directly coiled around him.

The three-headed old man wanted to escape. However, under the encirclement of the Divine Dragon, all his energy had been controlled.

He couldn’t even escape!

An expert who had just stepped into the control level couldn’t even retaliate against Wang Xian.

Wang Xian could even kill him instantly!

With the divine dragon around him, the three-headed old man wanted to resist.

However, all resistance was futile!

Wang Xian opened his mouth and spat out a terrifying sharp sword.

With a terrifying speed, it pierced through the body of the three-headed old man and completely obliterated him.

Following that, Wang Xian waved his arm and kept the corpse.

There was no change in his expression.

“Get Ready. There might be a big battle coming up!”

Wang Xian reminded Mo Sha.

“It’s the Dragon King. Your strength is so strong!”

Mo Sha looked at Wang Xian with admiration and said!

“Mo Sha, your starting point is very high now. You have a chance to reach my current level!”

Wang Xian smiled and said!

He scanned his surroundings and waited quietly.

He didn’t know how many experts from the witch spirit universe would rush over.

However, everything was out of Wang Xian’s expectations.

Time passed by minute by minute.

The breakthrough of the leader of the water god Dragon and the king of dark night withered gradually came to the final moment!

However, the experts from the sorcerer Spirit universe still did not come over.

This caused Wang Xian to reveal a hint of surprise.

“There are no experts coming over. What’s the situation? Are we too late?”

Wang Xian mumbled to himself. Looking at the two disciples who were about to complete their breakthrough, a smile appeared on his face!

Indeed.

After Wang Xian killed the three-headed old man in an instant and the three-headed old man was resurrected, he immediately informed the other two experts about the situation in the sorcerer Spirit Universe.

However, the other two powerhouses in the witch spirit universe were far away.

They could have used up their treasures to rush over in an instant. However, they did not rush over immediately.

Instead, they sought the support of other powerhouses immediately.

A great dao existence who could kill a control-level powerhouse in an instant was definitely not an ordinary great dao powerhouse.

They needed to find at least four control-level powerhouses or a great dao powerhouse to help them!

However, after they contacted them, even though they finally found four control-level great beings who were willing to help.

However, it would take them a few years to rush to the Witch Spirit Universe.

A few years was already very short.

However, after a few years, everything was too late.

This made the three great beings of the witch spirit universe look a little ugly and angry.

It was too late!

Under such circumstances, they could only watch helplessly as the foreign universe powerhouses occupied two spots in their universe.

There was nothing they could do even if they were unwilling.

This also made Wang Xian’s protection of the path exceptionally smooth.

This was also a huge benefit of being a top-notch powerhouse!
